Hadapi Piala Dunia Cricket 2020, Timnas Uji Tanding di Filipina
04 Nov 2019, 15:29 by Tempo.co, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Kepala Timnas Cricket Indonesia, Andy Cottam sudah mengantongi nama-nama pemain cricket yang bakal bergabung dalam Timnas Cricket Putra dan Putri untuk menghadapi laga internasional dan persiapan babak kualifikasi Piala Dunia Cricket 2020.
Mereka dijaring dari hasil Kejuaraan Nasional Cricket 2019 sekaligus babak kualifikasi PON 2020 yang digelar di Lapangan Cricket Buperta Cibubur Jakarta Timur, 26 Oktober hingga 4 November 2019.
"Ajang kejurnas sekaligus kualifikasi PON kali ini juga kita manfaatkan untuk menjaring pemain berkualitas yang akan memperkuat skuat timnas criket Indonesia yang dipersiapkan mengikuti kejuaraan internasional dan kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2020. Tadi, Andy Cottam sudah melaporkan sejumlah nama yang bakal direkrut menjadi pemain Timnas Cricket Indonesia," kata Wakil Ketua Umum Pengurus Pusat Persatuan Cricket Indonesia (PP PCI), Abhiram S Yadav usai menutup Kejurnas Cricket 2019, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Ya, saya sudah mendapatkan pemain muka baru yang bakal direkrut untuk memperkuat Timnas Cricket Indonesia. Ada sekitar delapan pemain yang sudah saya data dan akan laporkan," timpal Andy Cottam, pelatih asal
Laga internasional terdekat, kata Abhiram, Timnas Cricket Putri akan menjalani laga segitiga menghadapi Filipina dan Qatar di Filipina, 19-23 Desember 2019. Sedangkan Timnas Cricket Putra akan dipersiapkan untuk menghadapi babak kualifikasi Piala Dunia yang akan digelar di Bali, April 2020.
Mengingat target membuka peluang untuk bisa lolos dari babak kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2020, kata Abhiram, PP PCI akan menggelar pelatnas di Bali mulai Januari 2020. Indonesia akan bersaing dengan Filipina, Jepang dan Korea Selatan.
"Jika Timnas Putra berhasil menjadi juara maka berhak lolos mengikuti kualifikasi kedua. Kalau berhasil jadi juara lagi, maka Timnas Criket Putra Indonesia berhak lolos ke Piala Dunia Criket 2020 yang akan berlangsung di India. Tentu kita berharap Timnas Putra dapat tampil maksimal dan berhasil menjadi juara pada kualifikasi pertama pada April mendatang. Untuk itu, PP PCI akan memberikan dukungan yang maksimal dalam fase persiapan mereka," ujar Wakil Ketua Umum Persatuan Cricket Indonesia itu.

Face the 2020 Cricket World Cup, the National Team Test Match in the Philippines
04 Nov 2019, 15:29 by Tempo.co, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian Cricket Team Head Coach Andy Cottam has pocketed the names of cricket players who will join the Cricket Team for Men and Women to face international matches and preparations for the 2020 Cricket World Cup qualifiers.
They were netted from the results of the 2019 Cricket National Championship as well as the PON 2020 qualification round held at the Buperta Cibubur Cricket Field in East Jakarta, 26 October to 4 November 2019.
"This time we will also use the National Championship as well as the PON qualification to recruit quality players who will strengthen the Indonesian squad squad that is prepared to participate in international championships and 2020 World Cup qualifications. Earlier, Andy Cottam has reported a number of names that will be recruited as Indonesian Cricket national team players, "said Deputy Chairman of the Indonesian Cricket Union Association (PP PCI), Abhiram S Yadav after closing the 2019 Cricket National Championship, Monday (11/04/2019).
"Yes, I have got a new advance player who will be recruited to strengthen the Indonesian Cricket National Team. There are about eight players that I have data and will report," said Andy Cottam, the origin coach
The closest international match, said Abhiram, Women's Cricket National Team will undergo a triangular match against the Philippines and Qatar in the Philippines, 19-23 December 2019. While the Men's Cricket National Team will be prepared to face the World Cup qualifying round which will be held in Bali, April 2020.
Given the target of opening opportunities to qualify for the 2020 World Cup qualifying round, said Abhiram, PP PCI will hold national training in Bali from January 2020. Indonesia will compete with the Philippines, Japan and South Korea.
"If the Putra national team succeeds in becoming the champion it is entitled to qualify for the second qualification. If it succeeds in becoming the champion again, then the Indonesian Cricket Team for Indonesia will qualify for the 2020 Cricket World Cup which will take place in India. Of course we hope that the Putra national team can perform optimally and succeed in becoming the champion "in the first qualification next April. For that, PP PCI will provide maximum support in their preparation phase," said Deputy Chairman of the Indonesian Cricket Association.
